title: Get started with Cloudflare
description: Set up your application to benefit from Cloudflare's speed, security, and reliability.

modules.title: Concepts
modules.description:
Concepts explain the basic ideas behind how Cloudflare works and how you can work with Cloudflare.

Feel free to skip if you have a technical background.

pages.link_title: What is a Content Delivery Network (CDN)?
How Cloudflare protects different layers of your network

modules.title: Account setup
modules.description: Create and customize your Cloudflare account.

pages.additional_description: If you plan on using the Cloudflare API to manage various account settings, create an API token associated with your account.

modules.title: Add a domain
modules.description: Make a few updates at your registrar and within Cloudflare to improve your domain's [speed, security, and reliability](/fundamentals/get-started/concepts/how-cloudflare-works/#benefits).

pages.additional_description: If your domain is particularly sensitive to downtime, you may want to do a bit of pre-work before adding it to Cloudflare.

If you control your [origin server](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/cdn/glossary/origin-server/) and plan on using [Cloudflareâ€™s proxy](/dns/manage-dns-records/reference/proxied-dns-records/), review your server configuration to avoid accidentally blocking Cloudflare IP addresses.
**Note**: If do not already have a domain name, start with [Cloudflare Registrar](/registrar/get-started/register-domain/) instead.

modules.title: Domain resolution
modules.description: After your domain is active on Cloudflare, review your DNS settings to make sure visitors can access your site.

pages.additional_description: Though Cloudflare automatically scans for DNS records, you should review your records to avoid unexpected issues.
Make sure you understand Cloudflare's proxy status, which affects how Cloudflare treats incoming traffic to a DNS record.

modules.title: Security
modules.description: Review and optimize your security settings so your visitors' information and your site infrastructure are protected.

pages.link_title: Set up your Web Application Firewall (WAF)

modules.title: Other optimizations
modules.description: Go beyond the basics and optimize other aspects of your domain setup.

pages.link_title: How can I interact with Cloudflare?
